article: My husband and I are happy to have landed together in a new country just a month ago. We were sort of afraid about what will _ in the future. When we landed at the airport, a tall man with smiling eyes _ us. The days and months were somehow made _ for us by this kind man. He _ us in going to the bank, and in telling us where to buy almost everything. He told us he is our big _ . Twice, we watched match in a coffee shop. During the first get-together, we saw how his eyes beamed in happiness. He told us that we're _ -- my husband and I are together in this _ land. He said he has been _ for eight years now because he _ sees his family who are in his home country. During the second get-together, he told us that we are his family. He said that he _ us and that he will miss us because he has decided to go back to his home country. That night, he uttered these words which created a great effect on my life: " You _ my life..." As my husband and I went home that night, we almost could not _ what we heard. Deep in our _ , we were touched by our friend's words. We texted him upon reaching home, _ him for being so nice to us in the new land. We told him as well that we feel safe in going out when we are with him. Then he _ , " You are my family here."
